bug.summary: Builds are failing due to Apache Git downtime
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Build pre-submit is failing when a PR is raised in kubeflow/manifests. Dependency for Apache thrift isn't available as Apache's git server is down: <denchmark-link:https://status.apache.org/>https://status.apache.org/</denchmark-link>
Example build run: PR: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/pull/337>kubeflow/manifests#337</denchmark-link>
Build Prow Run: <denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_manifests/337/kubeflow-manifests-presubmit/1168818080973852672/>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_manifests/337/kubeflow-manifests-presubmit/1168818080973852672/</denchmark-link>
Kfctl build log: <denchmark-link:http://testing-argo.kubeflow.org/workflows/kubeflow-test-infra/kubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136?tab=workflow&nodeId=kubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136-2971841231&sidePanel=logs%3Akubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136-2971841231%3Amain>http://testing-argo.kubeflow.org/workflows/kubeflow-test-infra/kubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136?tab=workflow&nodeId=kubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136-2971841231&sidePanel=logs%3Akubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136-2971841231%3Amain</denchmark-link>
Logs: <denchmark-code>util.py 71 INFO go: error loading module requirements util.py 71 INFO Makefile:69: recipe for target 'generate' failed util.py 71 INFO make: *** [generate] Error 1 util.py 45 INFO Running: make build-kfctl cwd=/mnt/test-data-volume/kubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136/src/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap util.py 60 INFO Subprocess output: util.py 71 INFO go: finding git.apache.org/thrift.git v0.0.0-20180902110319-2566ecd5d999 util.py 71 INFO go: git.apache.org/thrift.git@v0.0.0-20180902110319-2566ecd5d999: git fetch -f https://git.apache.org/thrift.git refs/head s/*:refs/heads/* refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* in /mnt/test-data-volume/kubeflow-manifests-presubmit-kfctl-go-337-a4f9b57-2672-3136/pkg/mod/cache/vcs/83dba939f95a790e49 7d565fc4418400145a1a514f955fa052f662d56e920c3e: exit status 128: util.py 71 INFO fatal: unable to access 'https://git.apache.org/thrift.git/': Failed to connect to git.apache.org port 443: Connection tim ed out </denchmark-code>
What did you expect to happen: Expect build system to be up. Anything else you would like to add: Should we mirror go dependencies in a mirror? Environment: Unrelated to environment.
